name: BizTradeShows
tag_list: trade-shows, trade-fairs, business-exhibitions, trade-events, b2b-fairs, business-events, trade-expos, expositions, trade-expositions, international-trade-fairs, trade-fair-directory, trade-event-directory, trade-show, trade-shows-by-industry
overview: Biztradeshows.com is a subsidiary of IndiaMART.com, a leading online B2B marketplace. Established in 1996, IndiaMART.com, has created a goodwill in the market and is known as the best online marketplace . Being a subsidiary of the leading market player into b2b industry, Biztradeshows.com has also created a faith into the market. Biztradeshows.com is the leading directory for upcoming trade shows, trade fairs, international trade shows, business events, expos, business exhibitions, b2b fairs, trade events, trade expos, trade expositions, trade shows by country, trade shows by industry. To increase the userfriendly approch for searching events biztradeshows.com also developed gadget/ widgets and RSS Feeds.
